text: ICOM may refer to: * International Council of Museums * Icom Incorporated, radio equipment manufacturer * Industrial Common Ownership Movement (ICOM), a co-operative federation that now forms part of Co-operatives UK * Inputs, Controls, Outputs, and Mechanisms (ICOM), the conceptual parts of the IDEF0 function modeling methodology * ICOM Simulations, software company * ICOM Tele A/S, a Danish telecommunications operator
title: ICOM
